body_html:
I am not really happy with the amount of bazel magic we are calling here.
Ultimately, are we going to be able to simply run the following in this script?

$ echo "" | configure
$ bazel test tensorflow/...

body:
I am not really happy with the amount of bazel magic we are calling here.
Ultimately, are we going to be able to simply run the following in this script?

```
$ echo "" | configure
$ bazel test tensorflow/...
```
